divs: sighting detailsme & my best friend was riding our bikes back from la mirada park when out of the orange county area a large aluminum saucer caught my eye and i threw down my bike and ran out in the street yelling & waving to it and my friend rodney also saw it it stopped for 6 to 10 minutes then proceeded down rosecrans ave over the 5 freeway straight towards the lax direction now the shape was dome top\ disc on the side\ with tea cup bottom the entire saucer was made of aluminum looking material and was easily viewed because it wasn't trying to hide at less than 600 feet no lights no abstracted view it was awesome so now you know the truth personally i think its the government they lie because its nuclear powered and dangerous also top secret and we wouldn't want any other country to have it like nukes the one that crashed in roswell was a test flight they have always lied about all the really good flying craft and just about every thing else they feel the need to lie about now you know the truth ps i don't care what any one says because i already know what i saw it sure wasn't a light in the distance or any normal flying craft big brother is watching and he knows much more than i do but he will never tell the truth just me & jesus color was silver aluminum sort of like a flying fortress metal all you have is my word and you best believe because its the absolute truth now you know the truth
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Norwalk
There were no other sightings in Norwalk on or around June 6th 1973
